ops.description: fade({r:0, g:16, b:0, speed:8, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:8, b:0, speed:200, type:10, adjust:0});
fade({r:30, g:60, b:30, speed:8, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:16, b:0, speed:200, type:10, adjust:0});
fade({r:30, g:60, b:30, speed:8, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:16, b:0, speed:200, type:10, adjust:0});
fade({r:30, g:60, b:30, speed:8, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:16, b:0, speed:200, type:10, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:1, adjust:255});

ops.raw: a5 00 00 ee ff 35 fe c8 ff 35 00
a5 00 00 ee ff 35 fe c8 ff 35 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // Jessie
{Cloud}!
Look over here.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // Jessie
Okay, it's about to start.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // Jessie
This is a complete model
of the city of Midgar.{PAUSE}It's about a 1/10000 scale.{PAUSE}The top plate is about 50 meters
above ground.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // A main pillar supports
the plate in the center,
and there are other support pillars
built in each section

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // Psstwhisperwhisper
(The No. 1 Reactor we blew up
was in the northern section.){PAUSE}Then there's No. 2, No. 3 all the way up to
the No. 8 Reactor.{PAUSE}The 8 Reactors provide Midgar
with electricity.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // Each town used to have a name,
but no one in Midgar remembers them.{PAUSE}Instead of names, we refer to them
by numbered sectors.
That's how things turned out.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // Jessie
Phew, look what's
next! Look!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // Jessie
This is the route this train is on.{PAUSE}The route spirals around
the main pillar.{PAUSE}We should be coming around
the center, right now.{PAUSE}Each checkpoint has
an ID sensor device.{PAUSE}It checks the identities and
backgrounds of each
passenger on the train
and is linked up to the central data
bank at Shinra headquarters.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // Whisperwhisper
(We definitely look suspicious,
so we're using fake IDs.)
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings:
Jessie
This is a complete model
of the city of Midgar.{PAUSE}It's about a 1/10000 scale.{PAUSE}The top plate is about 50 meters
above ground.

A main pillar supports
the plate in the center,
and there are other support pillars
built in each section

Psstwhisperwhisper
(The No. 1 Reactor we blew up
was in the northern section.){PAUSE}Then there's No. 2, No. 3 all the way up to
the No. 8 Reactor.{PAUSE}The 8 Reactors provide Midgar
with electricity.

Each town used to have a name,
but no one in Midgar remembers them.{PAUSE}Instead of names, we refer to them
by numbered sectors.
That's how things turned out.

Jessie
This is the route this train is on.{PAUSE}The route spirals around
the main pillar.{PAUSE}We should be coming around
the center, right now.{PAUSE}Each checkpoint has
an ID sensor device.{PAUSE}It checks the identities and
backgrounds of each
passenger on the train
and is linked up to the central data
bank at Shinra headquarters.

Whisperwhisper
(We definitely look suspicious,
so we're using fake IDs.)
